duties_responsibilities.duty: Represent the overall Global Vendor Master setup process, focusing on business process, data integrity, SOX controls, and systemic functionality.
Work directly with project teams, organizations globally, and other stakeholders related to daily operations, process change management, system enhancements, and support activities.
Lead special Vendor Master operations projects, execute project requirements, and ensure SOX compliance and documentation retention.
Provide ad-hoc support for regional Vendor Master process owners when critical process issues arise and create ad-hoc analysis supporting vendor master operations and accounts payable.
Support audit requirements and 1042/1099 tax reporting.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in area of Finance or Accounting related field with 5+ years of experience (Master's preferred)
